ROOT.GetImpplantrunway: SELECT s.deptdesc,v.voltagedesc,w.rungencount,w.stopgencount,g.plimit as p,w.e FROM TPLANTRUNWAY w JOIN TDEPARTMENT s ON w.plantid=s.departidx AND s.departtype=8 LEFT JOIN TVOLTAGE v ON s.voltageidx=v.voltageidx LEFT JOIN (select plantid,SUM(UPPERLIMIT) AS plimit from TGENLIMIT GROUP BY PLANTID) g ON w.plantid=g.plantid
ROOT.GetImpunitrunway: select p.deptdesc,g.devicename,g.upperlimit,r.e from tgenrunway r JOIN tgenlimit g ON r.genid=g.genid JOIN TDEPARTMENT p ON g.plantid=p.departidx
ROOT.GetImplinerunway: select l.devicename as devicename, case w.state when 1 then '投运' when '0' then '停运' end as putstate,w.I as ppower,w.i as elecurrent,l.ilimit as ratedampacity from tlinerunway w left join tlinelimit l on l.lineid=w.lineid
ROOT.GetImpmainrunway: select tp.deptdesc as stationname,tm.devicename as devicename, case tw.state when 1 then '投运' when '0' then '停运' end as putstate, tw.L as ppower,tm.hlimit as powerlimit from TTRANSRUNWAY tw left join TTRANLIMIT tm on tm.transid=tw.transid left join TDEPARTMENT tp on tm.stationid=tp.departidx
ROOT.GetLoadlevel: select E as preele,L as pload from TLOADDATA
ROOT.GetWarypreset: select staname as stationname,Objectname as unitlinemainname, case State when 1 then '投运' when '0' then '停运' end as putstate, case "TYPE" when 1 then '计划读取' when 2 then '人工预设' end as presettype from TRUNWAYPRESET
ROOT.GetImpsectionrunway: select "name" as sectionname,state as putstate,"devname" as devicename, "L" as ppower,"value" as staline from TSECTIONRUNWAY sv left join "tbcrosssection" tt on sv.sectionid=tt.sectionid
ROOT.GetBreakdownpreset: select devicename as breakdownpart, case devicetype when 1 then '线路' when 2 then '主变' end as parttype,"DESC" as breakdowndescrib,'' from TFAULTPRESET
ROOT.GetFocuspreinstall: select case caretype when 1 then '默认关注' when 2 then '可选关注' when 3 then '特定关注' end as focustype, carepoint as focuspoint,carecontent as carecontent from TCARPRESET
ROOT.GetPowercutinf: select rownum,devicename as part,lostload as loadlose from TSTOPLOST
ROOT.GetOverloadinf: select rownum,devicename as part, case devicetype when 1 then '线路' when 2 then '主变' end as type, to_char(capicity,'99999')||'A' as capacity,to_char(tide,'9999.9')||'A' as trend, unit as loadpersent from TOVERLOAD
ROOT.GetPersonadjust: select rownum,case "TYPE" when 1 then '调整出力' when 2 then '负荷转移' when 3 then '停机' when 4 then '拉路限电' when 5 then '启机' end as type,content from TOPERATEITEM where faid = {0}
